name: Oddworld: Munch’s Exoddus
summary: A cancelled follow up to Munch’s Oddysee that would’ve been the second game outside the main quintology. The story would’ve had Munch with the last can of Gabbiar that he got hold of in the good ending of Munch’s Oddysee venture out to the Ma Spa where the Gabbit eggs would be fertilised and hatched into Gabbiwongs, of which would then begin their life cycle to save the Gabbit race from extinction.
